channel.title: Can't open .jar Clients
channel.description: i get this error "could not load or find main class" every time i open a server client file that is client.jar. I have to use the server files and open up the client.bat.... I checked if i set my variables and i did. I took them off and tried them both and it didn't work. When i put my variable back in the client.bat only works.

item.title: Can't open .jar Clients
item.dc:creator: @1800getk0ed 1800getk0ed
item.description:
@1800getk0ed wrote:

you’ve set the wrong manifest or update to the newest java. that always works.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't open .jar Clients
item.dc:creator: @infallibl3 infallibl3
item.description:
@infallibl3 wrote:

most likely a problem with your manifest.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't open .jar Clients

item.description:
@Vodzila wrote:

i get this error “could not load or find main class” every time i open a server client file that is client.jar. I have to use the server files and open up the client.bat… I checked if i set my variables and i did. I took them off and tried them both and it didn’t work. When i put my variable back in the client.bat only works.
